body: At 1st level, when a charlatan successfully deceives a creature with a Bluff, that creature takes a ­–2 penalty on the charlatan's Bluff checks for the next 24 hours. This ability does not stack with itself. This ability replaces trapfinding.
name: Natural Born Liar
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Rogue/Rogue Archetypes/Charlatan/Natural Born Liar
